text: "Missionary Man" is a 1986 song by Eurythmics. It was taken from their fifth studio album Revenge. It went to number 14 in the United States, number 13 in Ireland Canada, number 31 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in New Zealand and number 9 in Australia. It won a Grammy Award in 1987. ==Track listings== * UK 7-inch single :A. "Missionary Man" (7-inch version) – 3:50 :B. "The Last Time" (live at The Roxy in Los Angeles) * UK 12-inch single :A. "Missionary Man" (extended version) – 6:55 :B. "The Last Time" (live at The Roxy in Los Angeles) * US 7-inch single :A. "Missionary Man" (7-inch version) – 3:50 :B. "Take Your Pain Away" (LP version) – 4:37 * US 12-inch single :A. "Missionary Man" (extended version) – 6:55 :B. "Take Your Pain Away" (LP version) – 4:37 Category:1986 songs Category:Eurythmics songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Music stubs
title: Missionary Man (Eurythmics song)
